# Cauldron (Hex)
## Overview
*Cauldron (Ex)*: The witch receives [[Brew Potion (Feat)|Brew Potion]] as a bonus feat and a +4 insight bonus on [[Craft (Skill)|Craft]] (alchemy) skill checks.

**Source:** Advanced Player's Guide, pg. 66
